title: hextech crafting
body: How does rerolling skin shards work cause i want to get a skin for a champ i own ?

replies.body: Just a heads-up on the Hextech re-roller: It isn't called re-_troller_ without reason, as it just loves spewing out 750 RP skins, no matter what you put into it.

As SublimeBanana suggested, the reroll is random.  You can totally get a skin for a champ you already own, but you could also get a skin permanent for one you don't,  In which case you can hold on to it if you select to unlock the champion at a later date.
Select 3 skin shards, receive a RANDOM skin permenent shard.  The result is always random
